title: Grand Theft Auto - San Andreas (PC)
description:
Grand Theft Auto (GTA) - San Andreas
Console: PC

*******Install Instructions*******
1. Download
2. Disconnect network (internet connection)
3. Install (keep network disconnected)
         NOTE: Remember where you installed the game
4. Go into the install directory
5. Replace "gta_sa.exe" in the install directory with the one in the crack folder
         NOTE: You should still be disconnected from network
6. Allow this through the Firewall: gta_sa.exe (the one you copied and replaced,           the cracked one)
7. Play!

*******I did not create this game (obviously)*******
